snippet: A U.S. Senate subcommittee will hear testimony on the West Virginia chemical spill in Washington next week....

headline.print_headline: US Senate Hearing Feb. 4 on W.Va. Chemical Spill
headline.main: US Senate Hearing Feb. 4 on W.Va. Chemical Spill

lead_paragraph: A U.S. Senate subcommittee will hear testimony on the West Virginia chemical spill in Washington next week.
